siteMetadata.title: 国外股市热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title:
Bitcoin hits $57,000 for the first time, nearly doubling since the start of the year.

A week ago it was at $47,000.
A month ago it was at $34,000.
A year ago it was at $9,000.

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
比特币首次达到57000美元，自年初以来几乎翻了一番。

一周前，它的价格是47000美元。
一个月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

比特幣首次達到57000美元，自年初以來幾乎翻了一番。

一週前，它的價格是47000美元。
一個月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續38天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了54%。🙏 https://t.co/TabonANL9m

next.excerpt:
I would like to get your all thoughts on the bond yield increase this week. I am
not worried about the market downturn but the sudden increase in yields. On 2/16
the 10 year bonds yields increased by almost 9 percent and on 2/19 the yield
increased by almost 5 percent.

From the CNBC…
